title: Anil Kapoor Is Open To The Idea Of 'Nayak' Sequel And We Are Excited Already!
text:
Anil Kapoor Is Open To The Idea Of 'Nayak' Sequel And We Are Excited Already!
Anil Kapoor Is Open To The Idea Of 'Nayak' Sequel And We Are Excited Already!
Anil Kapoor and Amrish Puri starrer Nayak is one of the classics that was way ahead of its time. A political action thriller, Nayak: The Real Hero is a remake of S. Shankar's successful Tamil film Mudhalvan. The 2001 film narrated the story of how a common man fights against the corrupt system, and how his life changes after he becomes a Chief Minister for a day.
Twitter
Apart from Anil Kapoor, the film also starred Rani Mukerji, Paresh Rawal, Saurabh Shukla and the late Amrish Puri in pivotal roles.
During a recent media interaction, actor Anil Kapoor expressed his opinions and said that he thinks a sequel to his hit Nayak: The Real Hero will make for a good film. The actor was present on the sidelines of the T20 Dhamaal shoot at a sports channel studio in New Delhi.
"I think a sequel to Nayak would be a good idea,'' Anil told IANS when asked which film of his deserves a sequel.
When asked about the most exciting aspect of being in the industry at the moment, Total Dhamaal actor said,

"The new wave of ideas and content. The unexplored territories and new challenges.''
Currently, Anil Kapoor is all geared up for the release of Total Dhamaal. It is the third instalment of the successful franchise Dhamaal, which originally starred Arshad Warsi, Javed Jaffrey and Riteish Deshmukh alongside Sanjay Dutt.
The film is slated to release on February 22.
(With agency inputs)
description: During a recent interaction with reporters in New Delhi, Anil Kapoor said that the sequel of film Nayak will be a good idea. Starring Anil Kapoor and Rani Mukherji in the lead roles, Nayak was released in 2001. The actor is looking forward for his upcoming release Total Dhamaal.
